headline: Pandemic (H1N1) 2009 - update 56
main_text: 1 July 2009 09:00 GMT The breakdown of the number of laboratory-confirmed cases is given in the following table and map. Collectivity Netherlands Antilles, Curaçao : 3 confirmed cases: The three confirmed cases are crew members of a cruise ship. They did not leave the boat during their illness nor during the 24 hours preceding the onset of symptoms. Norway: 7 confirmed cases are crew members and passengers of a cruise ship. They did not leave the boat during their illness nor during the 24 hours preceding the onset of symptoms.
